coding_practice.title: Largest Sum of Averages
coding_practice.description:
You are given an integer array nums and an integer k. You can partition the array into at most k non-empty adjacent subarrays. The score of a partition is the sum of the averages of each subarray.

Note that the partition must use every integer in nums, and that the score is not necessarily an integer.

Return the maximum score you can achieve of all the possible partitions. Answers within 10-6 of the actual answer will be accepted.

examples.explanation:
The best choice is to partition nums into [9], [1, 2, 3], [9]. The answer is 9 + (1 + 2 + 3) / 3 + 9 = 20.
We could have also partitioned nums into [9, 1], [2], [3, 9], for example.
That partition would lead to a score of 5 + 2 + 6 = 13, which is worse.

coding_practice.explanation:
1. 建立前綴和 prefix，便於計算子數組的和。
2. dp[i][kk] 表示前 i 個元素分成 kk 個子數組的最大平均和。
3. 初始化 dp[i][1] 為前 i 個元素的平均值。
4. 使用動態規劃遞推 dp[i][kk]，考慮最後一段子數組從 j 到 i-1。
5. 返回 dp[n][k] 即為最大平均和。
